channel.title: Mage ## Need help ##
channel.description:
Okay hey, i was wondering if someone could point me in the right direction to adding a sleep/timer on mage spell..
On runescape, when you blitz, you can cast it, run up, dds, and when you're dds'ing, the mage hits... Now, on my server, the mage hits exactly the second you cast it. How would i make a timer, or some sort of sleep, so it would wait before hitting..
NOTE: Must do the GFX before hits..
Brief:
GFX 1-2 SEC WAIT HIT.
--
Much apreciated, thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2007, 09:14:15 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Mage ## Need help ##

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I dont want some tut. Its wrong anyway. Doesn’t work on some servers. And thats not what im after… -.-
